meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inelastic.
meanings.sent1: The inelasticity of the rubber band made it snap easily.
meanings.sent2: The inelasticity of the metal rod prevented it from bending.
meanings.sent3: The inelasticity of the cookie dough made it impossible to shape into fun designs.
meanings.sent4: The inelasticity of the frozen lake turned it into a dangerous surface to walk on.
meanings.sent5: The inelasticity of the old rubber tire was evident in its cracks and stiffness.

meanings.sent1: The inelasticity of the schedule left no room for changes.
meanings.sent2: The inelasticity of the company's policies made it hard for employees to suggest new ideas.
meanings.sent3: The inelasticity of the ruler caused it to break when bent too much.
meanings.sent4: The inelasticity of the tree branch made it snap under the weight of the snow.
meanings.sent5: The inelasticity of the old phone cord resulted in it tangling easily.
